text: <a href="../1-Chronicles-16-1/" title="1 Chronicles 16:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 So they brought the ark of God, and set it in the midst of the tent that David had pitched for it: and they offered burnt sacrifices and peace offerings before God.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-2/" title="1 Chronicles 16:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 And when David had made an end of offering the burnt offerings and the peace offerings, he blessed the people in the name of the LORD.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-3/" title="1 Chronicles 16:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 And he dealt to every one of Israel, both man and woman, to every one a loaf of bread, and a good piece of flesh, and a flagon *of wine*.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-4/" title="1 Chronicles 16:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 And he appointed *certain* of the Levites to minister before the ark of the LORD, and to record, and to thank and praise the LORD God of Israel:

<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-5/" title="1 Chronicles 16:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 Asaph the chief, and next to him Zechariah, Jeiel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Mattithiah, and Eliab, and Benaiah, and Obededom: and Jeiel with psalteries and with harps; but Asaph made a sound with cymbals;

<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-6/" title="1 Chronicles 16:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 Benaiah also and Jahaziel the priests with trumpets continually before the ark of the covenant of God.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-7/" title="1 Chronicles 16:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 Then on that day David delivered first *this psalm* to thank the LORD into the hand of Asaph and his brethren.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-8/" title="1 Chronicles 16:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 Give thanks unto the LORD, call upon his name, make known his deeds among the people.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-9/" title="1 Chronicles 16:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 Sing unto him, sing psalms unto him, talk ye of all his wondrous works.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-10/" title="1 Chronicles 16:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 Glory ye in his holy name: let the heart of them rejoice that seek the LORD.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-11/" title="1 Chronicles 16:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 Seek the LORD and his strength, seek his face continually.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-12/" title="1 Chronicles 16:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 Remember his marvellous works that he hath done, his wonders, and the judgments of his mouth;
<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-13/" title="1 Chronicles 16:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 O ye seed of Israel his servant, ye children of Jacob, his chosen ones.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-14/" title="1 Chronicles 16:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 He *is* the LORD our God; his judgments *are* in all the earth.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-15/" title="1 Chronicles 16:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 Be ye mindful always of his covenant; the word *which* he commanded to a thousand generations;
<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-16/" title="1 Chronicles 16:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 *Even of the covenant* which he made with Abraham, and of his oath unto Isaac;

<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-17/" title="1 Chronicles 16:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 And hath confirmed the same to Jacob for a law, *and* to Israel *for* an everlasting covenant,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-18/" title="1 Chronicles 16:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 Saying, Unto thee will I give the land of Canaan, the lot of your inheritance;
<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-19/" title="1 Chronicles 16:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19 When ye were but few, even a few, and strangers in it.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-20/" title="1 Chronicles 16:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20 And *when* they went from nation to nation, and from *one* kingdom to another people;
<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-21/" title="1 Chronicles 16:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21 He suffered no man to do them wrong: yea, he reproved kings for their sakes,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-22/" title="1 Chronicles 16:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22 *Saying*, Touch not mine anointed, and do my prophets no harm.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-23/" title="1 Chronicles 16:23 KJV verse detail"><span id="25" class="versehover">23 Sing unto the LORD, all the earth; shew forth from day to day his salvation.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-24/" title="1 Chronicles 16:24 KJV verse detail"><span id="26" class="versehover">24 Declare his glory among the heathen; his marvellous works among all nations.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-25/" title="1 Chronicles 16:25 KJV verse detail"><span id="27" class="versehover">25 For great *is* the LORD, and greatly to be praised: he also *is* to be feared above all gods.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-26/" title="1 Chronicles 16:26 KJV verse detail"><span id="28" class="versehover">26 For all the gods of the people *are* idols: but the LORD made the heavens.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-27/" title="1 Chronicles 16:27 KJV verse detail"><span id="29" class="versehover">27 Glory and honour *are* in his presence; strength and gladness *are* in his place.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-28/" title="1 Chronicles 16:28 KJV verse detail"><span id="30" class="versehover">28 Give unto the LORD, ye kindreds of the people, give unto the LORD glory and strength.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-29/" title="1 Chronicles 16:29 KJV verse detail"><span id="31" class="versehover">29 Give unto the LORD the glory *due* unto his name: bring an offering, and come before him: worship the LORD in the beauty of holiness.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-30/" title="1 Chronicles 16:30 KJV verse detail"><span id="32" class="versehover">30 Fear before him, all the earth: the world also shall be stable, that it be not moved.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-31/" title="1 Chronicles 16:31 KJV verse detail"><span id="33" class="versehover">31 Let the heavens be glad, and let the earth rejoice: and let *men* say among the nations, The LORD reigneth.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-32/" title="1 Chronicles 16:32 KJV verse detail"><span id="34" class="versehover">32 Let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof: let the fields rejoice, and all that *is* therein.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-33/" title="1 Chronicles 16:33 KJV verse detail"><span id="35" class="versehover">33 Then shall the trees of the wood sing out at the presence of the LORD, because he cometh to judge the earth.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-34/" title="1 Chronicles 16:34 KJV verse detail"><span id="36" class="versehover">34 O give thanks unto the LORD; for *he is* good; for his mercy *endureth* for ever.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-35/" title="1 Chronicles 16:35 KJV verse detail"><span id="37" class="versehover">35 And say ye, Save us, O God of our salvation, and gather us together, and deliver us from the heathen, that we may give thanks to thy holy name, *and* glory in thy praise.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-36/" title="1 Chronicles 16:36 KJV verse detail"><span id="38" class="versehover">36 Blessed *be* the LORD God of Israel for ever and ever. And all the people said, Amen, and praised the LORD.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-37/" title="1 Chronicles 16:37 KJV verse detail"><span id="39" class="versehover">37 So he left there before the ark of the covenant of the LORD Asaph and his brethren, to minister before the ark continually, as every day's work required:

<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-38/" title="1 Chronicles 16:38 KJV verse detail"><span id="40" class="versehover">38 And Obededom with their brethren, threescore and eight; Obededom also the son of Jeduthun and Hosah *to be* porters:

<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-39/" title="1 Chronicles 16:39 KJV verse detail"><span id="41" class="versehover">39 And Zadok the priest, and his brethren the priests, before the tabernacle of the LORD in the high place that *was* at Gibeon,

<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-40/" title="1 Chronicles 16:40 KJV verse detail"><span id="42" class="versehover">40 To offer burnt offerings unto the LORD upon the altar of the burnt offering continually morning and evening, and *to do* according to all that is written in the law of the LORD, which he commanded Israel;

<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-41/" title="1 Chronicles 16:41 KJV verse detail"><span id="43" class="versehover">41 And with them Heman and Jeduthun, and the rest that were chosen, who were expressed by name, to give thanks to the LORD, because his mercy *endureth* for ever;

<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-42/" title="1 Chronicles 16:42 KJV verse detail"><span id="44" class="versehover">42 And with them Heman and Jeduthun with trumpets and cymbals for those that should make a sound, and with musical instruments of God. And the sons of Jeduthun *were* porters.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-16-43/" title="1 Chronicles 16:43 KJV verse detail"><span id="45" class="versehover">43 And all the people departed every man to his house: and David returned to bless his house.
